story.title: Act I: The love
story.description: The downfall

story.title: The war
story.description: Ireland and Cornwall is in war

story.title: Isolde's journey
story.description: Isolde is taken by the so great hero Tristan, but is given one final gift by her mother. Two potions

story.title: The marriage
story.description: Isolde marries the old King Mark of Cornwall. A charming man that Isolde fell in love with at first sight

story.title: Envy
story.description: I hate that god forsaken brat, she has always gotten what she wanted! I'll KILL her, this time I will...

story.title: Act 2: Downward spiral
story.description: Deep below

story.title: The potions
story.description: With this I will finally be more than a humble servant...

story.title: The domed love
story.description: With that one potion of mysteries Tristan and Isolde fell madly in love. It was a cruel forbidden love, calculated and unforgiving, a seed planted, sowed and picked by me...

story.title: The meeting
story.description: O gracious King Mark, Ireland's brightest sun, I wish to inform you of the unfortunate news of your wifes blasphemy. Gather your finest solider's and meet me tonight in the garden...

story.title: The discovery
story.description: You dare insult me the King, your uncle... By taking the most precious person from me in the world you have failed me Tristan!

story.title: Act 3: Tristan's death
story.description: Our wretched lady

story.title: The wound
story.description: Now that sir Tristan is badly wounded I can finally finish my grand plan to take the seat of luxury

story.title: The decision
story.description: Please don't cry dear Isolde, Tristan's a warrior, a hero, he is strong. If you truly wish to meet him, I might know where to find him...

story.title: The death
story.description: No-no, dear Tristan please don't go! I love you and you love me... Don't leave me in this wretched world all alone!

story.title: The drink
story.description: I have waited long for this moment...

story.title: The sorrow
story.description: Dear Mark, don't dwell on their death, they were unworthy of your precious love

story.title: The ring
story.description: Brangäne I love you, you are the most wonderful person. Please serve by my side as queen of Cornwall

story.title: The luxury
story.description: From there on I lived happily ever after

story.title: The forsaken
story.description: Isolde! Don't go with him you are my only light left!

story.title: The fail
story.description: Isolde has returned to the king and I shall stay by her side for all eternity.

story.title: The secret
story.description:
Your secret is safe with me Isolde! 
- 'Being quick doesn't catch the feast...'

story.title: Act 3: Isolde's death
story.description: The fragile

story.title: The potion
story.description: With this I will finally hold the crown...

story.title: The maidens death
story.description: Isolde. Dear Isolde, I never meant to hurt you. For you are my precious friend, but it had to be done...

story.title: The broken
story.description: N-n-no...

story.title: The envoy
story.description: This isn't fair! I didn't kill my dear Isolde. How could I ever murder such precious ray of sunshine!

story.title: The execution
story.description: Brangäne is hear by sentenced to the fiery pits of fairy land!

story.title: The squeaker
story.description: Your majesty, I have a dire message to deliver! Brangäne has mercilessly sent of Isolde to the fairy land!

story.title: The capture
story.description: Capture the heretic! Whoever brings her to me first will be rewarded handsomely with treasures beyond belief!

story.title: The reveal
story.description: King Mark, I can't hide it anymore. My love for Tristan is bigger than life itself even more merciless than fairy land.

story.title: The again
story.description: Finally! She'll be of to fairy land, my plan is working...

story.title: The proposal
story.description: Isolde, you've consoled me and always been by my side. Please serve by my side as queen of Cornwall

story.title: The again
story.description: Maybe money and power is everything. After all that im all but content, rather I regret my choices maybe then would I still have dear Isolde by my side...

story.title: The dread
story.description: Now with both Isolde and Tristan out of the way I can finally take the crown!

story.title: The mistake
story.description: Capture the traitor! Whoever brings her to me will be rewarded handsomely with treasures beyond belief!

story.title: The escape
story.description: And I was never seen again in the kingdom of Cornwall...
